text: Although it seems speculative and complex , some researchers have found that reduction of the rate of poliovirus protein synthesis through large - scale utilization of codons that are not optimal has caused attenuation of viral virulence by lowering specific infectivity [ 34 ] . Therefore , the information from this study may not only have theoretical value in understanding poliovirus evolution ( especially for DVPVs genotype 1 ) , but also have practical value for the development the poliovirus vaccine .
